attributes.action: To stop graphic material from being shown on Kids TV/Video platforms.
attributes.additional_details: There's a video at this link here that provides an example of this content https://www.parents.com/toddlers-preschoolers/everything-kids/parents-warn-this-youtube-kids-content-turns-sickly-violent/
attributes.background: There's a large amount of videos that are purporting to be for young children but have been edited to include graphic images, and/or messages. Young people are being exposed to dangerous and disturbing content. This a public health crisis waiting to happen. Technology companies are not doing enough!
